#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
#define M 100
int n;
int test[M][M], Maze[M][M];
int cnt = 0;
void Path(int x, int y){
	if (x == (n - 1) && y == (n - 1)){
		cnt++;
		return;
	}
	else{
		test[x][y] = 1;
		if ((x - 1) >= 0 && test[x - 1][y] == 0 && Maze[x - 1][y] == 0){
			Path(x - 1, y);
		}
		if ((y - 1) >= 0 && test[x][y - 1] == 0 && Maze[x][y - 1] == 0){
			Path(x, y - 1);
		}
		if ((x + 1) < n && test[x + 1][y] == 0 && Maze[x + 1][y] == 0){
			Path(x + 1, y);
		}
		if ((y + 1) < n && test[x][y + 1] == 0 && Maze[x][y + 1] == 0){
			Path(x, y + 1);
		}
		test[x][y] = 0;
	}
}

int main(){
	cin >> n;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
	{
		for (int j = 0; j < n; j++){
			cin >> Maze[i][j];
			test[i][j] = 0;
		}
	}
	Path(0, 0);
	cout << cnt << endl;
	return 0;

}
